How about that...\""},{"lineNumber":171907,"originalJapaneseLine":"「たぁぁぁぁっくさん、いるのよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There are so many!\""},{"lineNumber":171908,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺を主と仰いで、俺の命令ならなんでも聞くって奴らがなあ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Those who worship me as their lord, and will obey my every command!\""},{"lineNumber":171909,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、そうだ！　俺様は頂点に立ったのよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, that's right! I am standing at the top!\""},{"lineNumber":171910,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔物共の頂点にな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At the top of all monsters!\""},{"lineNumber":171911,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは俺があの優等生ぶった人間びいきの","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That was when I crushed the faction of Hornet,"},{"lineNumber":171912,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔王ガイの娘、ホーネットの派閥をブッ潰した時のことだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"the human-favoring honor student demon king Guy's daughter.\""},{"lineNumber":171913,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あとは人間界に攻め込み逃げ回る魔王を捕まえて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then all that remained was to invade the human world and catch the fleeing Demon King,"},{"lineNumber":171914,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様が魔王に成り代わるだけ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and I would replace him as the Demon King...\""},{"lineNumber":171915,"originalJapaneseLine":"「誰もが俺が魔王になることを望んだぜ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone wished for me to become the Demon King.\""},{"lineNumber":171916,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とーーーーぜんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course."},{"lineNumber":171917,"originalJapaneseLine":"　逃げ回る人間のガキより、俺様の方がよっぽど魔王の器だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I am far more fit to be the Demon King than that cowardly human kid.\""},{"lineNumber":171918,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから！　どいつもこいつも俺様を支持する！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's why! Everyone supports me!"},{"lineNumber":171919,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺こそが次なる魔王に相応しいと認める！」","translatedEnglishLine":"They all agree that I am the one worthy of being the next Demon King!\""},{"lineNumber":171920,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺を慕い！　敬い！　忠を尽くす！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They adore me! Respect me! And serve me loyally!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……どこにそんなものがある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Where would something like that be?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、じゃあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, then..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「幻を見たんだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You must have seen an illusion."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……今のが幻、ですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That just now was an illusion?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんなにハッキリと見えていたのに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though I saw it so clearly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「恐怖にかられた者はな…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those overcome by fear..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時にそうやって幻覚を見る」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sometimes have such hallucinations."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気をしっかり持てばそんなことにはならない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you keep your wits about you, that won't happen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うろたえるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't panic."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はいっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐瘴気の影響で★ランク３０以下のキャラは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to the influence of the poisonous miasma, characters ranked ★30 or lower

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行動不能になりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have become unable to act.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの部屋――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Cave Bliss's room—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 六千年を振り返る思い出話も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The tale looking back over six thousand years,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ終わりを迎えようとしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was about to come to an end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ〜……長ぇ話になっちまったな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... it's become quite a long story..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺の人生ってなぁ、つまるところ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "My life in the end,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歴代魔王と魔人達との一生だった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has been a lifetime spent with the successive Demon Kings and demons..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして……俺が魔王に……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And then... me becoming the Demon King...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世で最も偉い奴になるまでの話さ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The story of how I became the greatest and most powerful being in this world..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「歴代最低の魔王ガイが言った言葉に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When the worst Demon King in history, Guy, said something,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までの人生で俺ぁ一番ブチ切れた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I got more pissed off than at anything else in my life."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そろそろ次の魔王を決めねぇといけねぇって頃……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was around the time when we had to decide the next Demon King...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴はよりにもよって異世界から呼んだ人間のガキを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He said he was going to make some human kid summoned from another world

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王にすると言いだしやがったんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Demon King..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかも、そのガキァ！　魔王になんてなりたくねぇらしい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And that kid! Apparently he didn't even want to become the Demon King!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふざけてんじゃねぇぞ！　俺だ！　魔王には俺がなりてぇんだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't mess around! It's me! I want to be the Demon King!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それをぽっと出のガキになんざなられてたまるか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't allow some newcomer kid to take that from me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、言いたかったさ……言いたかったが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's what I wanted to say... I wanted to, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺じゃあガイには到底敵わねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just couldn't possibly beat Guy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここでも！　ここでも俺はまた我慢することになったんだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even here! Even here, I had to endure it again!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はんっ！　それなら構やしねぇ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph! In that case, whatever!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう六千年も待ったんだ！　今更死んでたまるか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've waited six thousand years already! There's no way I'm going to die now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが、今に見ていろ！　最後に笑うのはこの俺様だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But just watch! In the end, I'll be the one laughing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この最高にエレガントで最高に格好いい俺様なんだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This supremely elegant and utterly cool me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつか絶対にぃぃぃぃい！！！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Someday, absolutely!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へっ、へへ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh, hehe..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして……その時は思ったよりも早くきた……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And then... that time came sooner than I thought..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なあ、想像してみろよ……考えてみろ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, try to imagine it... think about it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今まで膝をついて頭を垂れていた俺様が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I, who had been kneeling and bowing my head until now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立ち上がって遠くまで見渡すと、ええ？　どうだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stand up and look out far into the distance, huh? How about that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たぁぁぁぁっくさん、いるのよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There are so many!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺を主と仰いで、俺の命令ならなんでも聞くって奴らがなあ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who worship me as their lord, and will obey my every command!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、そうだ！　俺様は頂点に立ったのよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, that's right! I am standing at the top!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物共の頂点にな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At the top of all monsters!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは俺があの優等生ぶった人間びいきの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That was when I crushed the faction of Hornet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ガイの娘、ホーネットの派閥をブッ潰した時のことだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the human-favoring honor student demon king Guy's daughter."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あとは人間界に攻め込み逃げ回る魔王を捕まえて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then all that remained was to invade the human world and catch the fleeing Demon King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が魔王に成り代わるだけ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I would replace him as the Demon King..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰もが俺が魔王になることを望んだぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everyone wished for me to become the Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とーーーーぜんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げ回る人間のガキより、俺様の方がよっぽど魔王の器だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am far more fit to be the Demon King than that cowardly human kid."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから！　どいつもこいつも俺様を支持する！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's why! Everyone supports me!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺こそが次なる魔王に相応しいと認める！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They all agree that I am the one worthy of being the next Demon King!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺を慕い！　敬い！　忠を尽くす！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They adore me! Respect me! And serve me loyally!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……どこにそんなものがある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Where would something like that be?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、じゃあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, then..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「幻を見たんだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You must have seen an illusion."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……今のが幻、ですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That just now was an illusion?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんなにハッキリと見えていたのに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though I saw it so clearly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「恐怖にかられた者はな…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those overcome by fear..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時にそうやって幻覚を見る」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sometimes have such hallucinations."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気をしっかり持てばそんなことにはならない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you keep your wits about you, that won't happen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うろたえるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't panic."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はいっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐瘴気の影響で★ランク３０以下のキャラは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to the influence of the poisonous miasma, characters ranked ★30 or lower

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行動不能になりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have become unable to act.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの部屋――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Cave Bliss's room—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 六千年を振り返る思い出話も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The tale looking back over six thousand years,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ終わりを迎えようとしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was about to come to an end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ〜……長ぇ話になっちまったな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... it's become quite a long story..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺の人生ってなぁ、つまるところ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "My life in the end,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歴代魔王と魔人達との一生だった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has been a lifetime spent with the successive Demon Kings and demons..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして……俺が魔王に……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And then... me becoming the Demon King...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世で最も偉い奴になるまでの話さ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The story of how I became the greatest and most powerful being in this world..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「歴代最低の魔王ガイが言った言葉に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When the worst Demon King in history, Guy, said something,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までの人生で俺ぁ一番ブチ切れた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I got more pissed off than at anything else in my life."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そろそろ次の魔王を決めねぇといけねぇって頃……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was around the time when we had to decide the next Demon King...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴はよりにもよって異世界から呼んだ人間のガキを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He said he was going to make some human kid summoned from another world

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王にすると言いだしやがったんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Demon King..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかも、そのガキァ！　魔王になんてなりたくねぇらしい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And that kid! Apparently he didn't even want to become the Demon King!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふざけてんじゃねぇぞ！　俺だ！　魔王には俺がなりてぇんだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't mess around! It's me! I want to be the Demon King!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それをぽっと出のガキになんざなられてたまるか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't allow some newcomer kid to take that from me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、言いたかったさ……言いたかったが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's what I wanted to say... I wanted to, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺じゃあガイには到底敵わねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just couldn't possibly beat Guy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここでも！　ここでも俺はまた我慢することになったんだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even here! Even here, I had to endure it again!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はんっ！　それなら構やしねぇ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph! In that case, whatever!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう六千年も待ったんだ！　今更死んでたまるか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've waited six thousand years already! There's no way I'm going to die now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが、今に見ていろ！　最後に笑うのはこの俺様だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But just watch! In the end, I'll be the one laughing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この最高にエレガントで最高に格好いい俺様なんだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This supremely elegant and utterly cool me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつか絶対にぃぃぃぃい！！！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Someday, absolutely!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へっ、へへ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh, hehe..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして……その時は思ったよりも早くきた……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And then... that time came sooner than I thought..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なあ、想像してみろよ……考えてみろ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, try to imagine it... think about it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今まで膝をついて頭を垂れていた俺様が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I, who had been kneeling and bowing my head until now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立ち上がって遠くまで見渡すと、ええ？　どうだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stand up and look out far into the distance, huh? How about that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たぁぁぁぁっくさん、いるのよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There are so many!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺を主と仰いで、俺の命令ならなんでも聞くって奴らがなあ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who worship me as their lord, and will obey my every command!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、そうだ！　俺様は頂点に立ったのよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, that's right! I am standing at the top!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物共の頂点にな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At the top of all monsters!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは俺があの優等生ぶった人間びいきの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That was when I crushed the faction of Hornet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ガイの娘、ホーネットの派閥をブッ潰した時のことだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the human-favoring honor student demon king Guy's daughter."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あとは人間界に攻め込み逃げ回る魔王を捕まえて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then all that remained was to invade the human world and catch the fleeing Demon King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が魔王に成り代わるだけ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I would replace him as the Demon King..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰もが俺が魔王になることを望んだぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everyone wished for me to become the Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とーーーーぜんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げ回る人間のガキより、俺様の方がよっぽど魔王の器だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am far more fit to be the Demon King than that cowardly human kid."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから！　どいつもこいつも俺様を支持する！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's why! Everyone supports me!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺こそが次なる魔王に相応しいと認める！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They all agree that I am the one worthy of being the next Demon King!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺を慕い！　敬い！　忠を尽くす！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They adore me! Respect me! And serve me loyally!"
